answers.answer: go to the web and type fingernails and a web site will appear that can give you more information.

question: My husband is 45.  His thumb nail is sinking (indenting) severerly.  I am trying tofind out what this might be indicating as far as his health.His family genetics is not too positive - diabetes, heart problems, obesity.He seems healthy but I know this is not a good sign.Please help me find out what MIGHT be causing this.  Thank you.
title: Severe indentation of thumb nail
